Beautiful-Vue-Hooks

为Vue3开发的一个优美的Hooks集合 

import { useMouseState } from '../../../dist'
export default {
  setup() {
    const { screenX, screenY } = useMouseState()
    return {
      screenX,
      screenY
    }
  }
}
